snippet: President Obama has asked the F.C.C. to put service providers under the same rules as those imposed on telephone companies 80 years ago.
abstract: Federal Communications Commission says its five members are expected to consider proposal from Chairman Tom Wheeler on net neutrality rules in February.
lead_paragraph: President Obama has asked the F.C.C. to put service providers under the same rules as those imposed on telephone companies 80 years ago.

headline.main: F.C.C. Sets Vote on Broadband Rules for February
headline.print_headline: F.C.C. Sets Vote on Broadband Rules for February
